com.hamweather.aeris.maps.interfaces

Interface AnimationControlDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AerisMapView

    public interface AnimationControlDelegate
    Animation delegates for how to talk with the AnimationControlView. These methods can be used from the AerisMapView to talk to the the animating tiles.
    Author:
    bcollins

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onNextPressed() 
      void onPreviousPressed() 
      void setStepViewVisibility(boolean visible) 
      void showStepOfAnimation(int step, int max) 
      void startAerisAnimation()
      Event to start the animation process.
      void stopAerisAnimation()
      Event to stop the animation.

    • Method Detail

      • startAerisAnimation

        void startAerisAnimation()
        Event to start the animation process. The current AerisTile layer active will be used to animate.

      • stopAerisAnimation

        void stopAerisAnimation()
        Event to stop the animation. This will hide the animation and return the currently applied tile layer to visible.

        void onNextPressed()

      • onPreviousPressed

                       int max)
